ActFood and Drugs Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Food and Drug Regulations (1609 â€“ Talc)
PrecisRegulations Amending the FOOD AND DRUG REGULATIONS (1609 - TALC) in order to enable the use of the food additive talc as a coating agent in the production of free flowing dried split legumes at a maximum level of use consistent with good manufacturing practice.
